text: Camillo Migliori, best known as Camillo Milli (1 August 1929 â€“ 20 January 2022) was an Italian actor. He was born in Milan, Italy. His career began in 1951. He was best known for his role as Ugo Monti in the Canale 5 TV series CentoVetrine. Milli died from problems caused by COVID-19 in Genoa, Italy on 20 January 2022, at the age of 92. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian television actors Category:Italian stage actors Category:Actors from Milan Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Italy
title: Camillo Milli
